## Attaching Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r}
fx = expression(x ^ 2)
der_fx = deriv(fx, 'x')
```

```{r}
x <- 3
eval(der_fx)
```

```{r}
Pa = expression(2 * (3 * a + 2)^ 4)
der_Pa = deriv(Pa, 'a')
```

```{r}
a <- 1.2
eval(der_Pa)
```
